https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/aUhzHDnFRWN2LKAjuS0VcDCspE4.jpg Bohee, a middle school student who lives with his mother learns one day that his father is alive. Feeling betrayed by his own mother, Bohee runs away from home and visits his half-sister Namhee with his best friend Nokyang to collect clues about his father. A Boy and Sungreen
